channel.title: Client help!

item.title: Client help!
item.dc:creator: @naughty_jef naughty jef
item.description:
@naughty_jef wrote:

k so i have tried to add a thing where when you run the server it adds all of the models, so it goes through every model and in the runclient.bat window it says eg. [1231] has been added successfully, but when i go in the client it doesnt workâ€¦ any ideas? not the only file i have edited it client.java is this a problem? this is what i have added so far.
client.java

public void addmods() // by braiton

for(int anIntX = 0; anIntX < 40000; anIntX++) {

and further down the script

 public byte[] GetModels(int Index)
{
 try
 {

byte[] aByte = new byte[(int)Model.length()];
FileInputStream Fis = new FileInputStream(Model);
Fis.read(aByte);
method77("aByte = ["+aByte+"]!", 0, "", aBoolean991);
Fis.close();
return aByte;
}
catch(Exception e)

}

PLEASE HELP IM REALLY TRYING TO FIGURE THIS OUT!
